column2:
"Hahah...I told you when you
finished your last special trial.
I said#0,""I won't have anything to say.""

"Well, don't believe for a moment I meant that you're
a true master. That will only come by surmounting
all manner of difficulties."
"Now then, let the true test begin."

"ふふふ……君が先の特訓を
クリアした際、私は言ったぞ。
「あの時点で言うことはない」とな。"

"あれでマスターと思うなかれ、だ！
あらゆる難題を超えてこその熟達者だ！"

"さあ、はじめようか。
新たなる試練を、な！"
